name: Agate stone
description: A simulation of the concentric layers of the banded patterns characteristic of many gemstones.

name: Marble lake
description: This artwork was made with p5.js and particles with variable colour and alpha channel flowing through a noise field.

name: Fluid
description: A series of fluid forms made with circles and gradients.

name: Daisy
description: A mathematical approach for drawing a daisy.

name: Black hole
description: A radial combination of Bezier curves.

name: Divergent flow
description: Colour-filled particles flowing through a perlin noise vector field.

name: Imaginary topography
description: Colour-filled particles flowing through a perlin noise vector field.

name: Textile craters
description: Thirteen colourful dotted particles let free for two hours.

name: Lava sea
description: A glitched version of a shore.

name: Waving fabric
description: Colour-filled particles flowing through a perlin noise vector field.

name: Water currents
description: Colour-filled particles flowing through a perlin noise vector field.
